name: mine construction, bauxite | mine infrastructure, bauxite | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8012/documentation

It is assumed that the mine is in use for 20 years and has a yearly output of 1E6 t/a;The dataset is almost completely based on the dasaset found in ecoinvent v2.2, with the exception of some fields being added for ecoinvent v3 compliance (e.g. production volume) and a property "lifetime_capacity" being added.

Includes the infrastructure and their disposal (buildings with their land use and machines) needed to provide the dried bauxite.

Ends when the mine is "constructed",  Dataset does not include the land use for the mine itself nor that for the roads in the mine.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects
tags: Sector: Infrastructure & Machinery; Resource Extraction; Minerals

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average technology for the aluminium consumed in Europe

flow.name: mine infrastructure, bauxite
flow.category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

exchanges.description: Estimated from knowledge of other mines.

Estimation based on Mori G. and Adelhardt W. (1998) Stoffmengenflüsse und Energiebedarf bei der Gewinnung ausgewählter mineralischer Rohstoffe; Teilstudie Aluminium. In: Geologisches Jahrbuch, Vol. Sonderhefte SH 2. Bundesanstalt für Geowissen-schaften und Rohstoffe, Hannover. ISBN 3-510-95824-1
EcoSpold01Location=CH
